item.title: I play Xonotic now
item.description: FreeBSD has been my server operating system of choice for the past two decades. I may have started on Linux (with a Walnut Creek CD of Linux Slackware), but after I got out of university I started toying around with the *BSD flavors (particularly FreeBSD and OpenBSD). FreeBSD is clean, has sensible defaults, and frankly, the ports and package system is just hassle-free when it comes to getting up and running.
